History

Path: History
Last Update: Sun Jul 24 20:39:23 -0600 2011

0.3.0 / 2008-10-27

Major update with refactoring (ex ExtArr is now ExternalArray) and greatly expanded testing. [] and []= methods all Externals now comply with the Array specification in RubySpec. Implementation of other methods is under way.

0.1.0 / 2007-12-10 revision 23

Initial release with working [] and []= methods and several basic array functions for ExtInd, ExtArr, and ExtArc.
